languages.text: "Позволь дать тебе совет напоследок: остерегайся внимания Аребенниана, элантах, пока он к тебе добр. А если разгневаешь... Беги прочь, скрывайся и молись о спасении. Ибо служитель Смеющегося бога всегда настигает свою жертву".

traits.locale_text: "Позволь дать тебе совет напоследок: остерегайся внимания Аребенниана, элантах, пока он к тебе добр. А если разгневаешь... Беги прочь, скрывайся и молись о спасении. Ибо служитель Смеющегося бога всегда настигает свою жертву".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."
languages.original_text: "Позволь дать тебе совет напоследок: остерегайся внимания Аребенниана, элантах, пока он к тебе добр. А если разгневаешь... Беги прочь, скрывайся и молись о спасении. Ибо служитель Смеющегося бога всегда настигает свою жертву".

traits.locale_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."

traits.locale_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."

traits.locale_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “请允许我给你个忠告——如果独角对你以礼相待，那务必要当心他的密切注视，外界人。而如果你招致了他的怒火……赶紧跑，藏起来，祈求能得到救赎，因为笑神的仆人总是能找到他们的猎物。”
languages.original_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我给你个忠告——如果独角以对你以礼相待，那务必要当心他的密切注视，外界人。而如果你招致了他的怒火……赶紧跑，藏起来，祈求能得到救赎，因为笑神的仆人总是能找到他们的猎物。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."

languages.text: «Permíteme darte un último consejo: ten cuidado con la atención del Arebennian cuando es amable contigo, elantach. Y, si alguna vez lo haces enfurecer... corre, escóndete y reza por la salvación. Los sirvientes del dios que ríe siempre atrapan a sus presas».
languages.original_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."

traits.locale_text: «Permíteme darte un último consejo: ten cuidado con la atención del Arebennian cuando es amable contigo, elantach. Y, si alguna vez lo haces enfurecer... corre, escóndete y reza por la salvación. Los sirvientes del dios que ríe siempre atrapan a sus presas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、これは最後の忠告だ。アーベニアンが親切に振る舞ってくれる間は、細心の注意を払うといい。万が一にも、彼の怒りを買うようなことがあれば…逃げ、隠れ、救いを祈るのだ。笑う神のしもべは、獲物を逃しはしないのだから」
languages.original_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、これは最後の忠告だ。アーベニアンが親切に振る舞ってくれる間は、細心の注意を払うといい。万が一にも、彼の怒りを買うようなことがあれば…逃げ、隠れ、救いを祈るのだ。笑う神のしもべは、獲物を逃しはしないのだから」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Gestattet mir einen letzten Ratschlag: Hütet Euch vor der allzu engen Aufmerksamkeit des Arebennian, Elantach, auch wenn er freundlich ist. Und solltet Ihr seinen Zorn auf Euch ziehen ... Flieht, versteckt Euch und betet um Erlösung. Denn ein Diener des Lachenden Gotts fängt seine Beute immer."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."

traits.locale_text: "Gestattet mir einen letzten Ratschlag: Hütet Euch vor der allzu engen Aufmerksamkeit des Arebennian, Elantach, auch wenn er freundlich ist. Und solltet Ihr seinen Zorn auf Euch ziehen ... Flieht, versteckt Euch und betet um Erlösung. Denn ein Diener des Lachenden Gotts fängt seine Beute immer."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Permettez-moi de vous donner un dernier conseil, elantach : méfiez-vous de l'attention que vous accorde l'Arebennian tant que vous êtes dans ses bonnes grâces. Et si jamais vous avez le malheur de vous attirer ses foudres... courez, cachez-vous et priez pour que votre Empereur vous accorde le salut, car les serviteurs du Dieu Moqueur attrapent toujours leurs proies. »
languages.original_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."

traits.locale_text: « Permettez-moi de vous donner un dernier conseil, elantach : méfiez-vous de l'attention que vous accorde l'arebennian tant que vous êtes dans ses bonnes grâces. Et si jamais vous avez le malheur de vous attirer ses foudres... courez, cachez-vous et priez pour que votre Empereur vous accorde le salut, car les serviteurs du Dieu Moqueur attrapent toujours leurs proies. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "İzninle son bir tavsiyede bulunacağım: Sana kibar davransa da Arebennian'ın tüm dikkatini sana vermesine müsaade etme elantach. Ancak öfkesini üstüne çekersen... Kaç, saklan ve kurtulmak için dua et. Çünkü Gülen Tanrı'nın hizmetkârları, her daim avlarını yakalarlar."
languages.original_text: "Allow me to bestow one final piece of advice: beware the Arebennian's close attention, elantach, while he is kind to you. And should you incur his wrath... Run, hide, and pray for salvation. For a servant of the Laughing God always catches their prey."

traits.locale_text: "İzninle son bir tavsiyede bulunacağım: Sana kibar davransa da Arebennian'nin tüm dikkatini sana vermesine müsaade etme elantach. Ancak öfkesini üstüne çekersen... Kaç, saklan ve kurtulmak için dua et. Çünkü Gülen Tanrı'nın hizmetkârları, her daim avlarını yakalarlar."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
